ygData.subject: RE: Plane of Air
ygData.msgSnippet: My friend was in Plane of Air last night. They got a bard belt (Clavicus on Solusek Ro got it) off one of the big guys there. My theory is that you can either
ygData.messageBody:
My friend was in Plane of Air last night.

They got a bard belt (Clavicus on Solusek Ro got it) off one of the big guys
there.
My theory is that you can either get all the things and quest for the
objects. Or, very
occasionally, they will drop as loot off of some of the critters. Most of
the loot dropped, though, was quest objects. From what I could tell looking
over my friend's shoulder.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 13 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 18 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 16 Songweaver of Solusek Ro, Mythical Alliance,Test /
Feyre, level 8 Dark Elf Wizard of Solusek Ro, Mythical Alliance, Test /
Fyere, level 1 Gnome Wizard of Solusek Ro, Test

>

>
>*drool*
>
>is this a quest component or the final product, do you know? i heard that
>all the items on PoS were obtainable only through quests, but the quest
>components and npcs were found there.
>
>Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
>Tyria Sarkin, L37 High Elf Wizard
><Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>
